name: Square Off
description:
Roll to move. Move to aim. Aim to win.
You're a square, and it's time to Square Off!

Up to 4 friends get to battle it out in this "edgy" arena party brawler with unique controls.

A New Spin On 2D Platforming
You move by rolling. You also aim by rolling. You can climb anything. Chaos reigns supreme with this control scheme.



We Accept All Types Of Playstyles
Want to play skillfully and maneuver like a master? That works.
Want to button mash and create mayhem wherever you roll? Yeah, that works too.

Orient Yourself To Your Abilities
Obliterate your friends with an array of unique abilities that attach themselves to one of your sides. Use these to fight off your friends!
If you survive long enough, you'll be able to pick up boosts that jetpack you across the map or shield you from harm.
If you keep surviving, acquire an ultimate ability to unleash complete devastation on your friends.



Location Location Location
A multitude of stages with unique mechanics add to the chaos by providing new possibilities for play, whether you're bouncing sky-high, knocking another player into lava, or throwing yourself through a teleporter.



Support For The Underdog
Losing? Don't worry! With a variety of underdog powerups, no game will ever be truly lost as you unleash new powers that increase in power the further you are behind.



Free Forever
Play with your friends for free. This will never change regardless of how much new content goes into the game!
